mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture( category, lecture_name, id, room_num, start_date, end_date, lecture_time, lecture_day lecture_price ) VALUES ( #{category}, #{lectureName}, #{id}, #{roomNum}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{lectureTime}, #{lectureDay}, #{lecturePrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) count, lecture_no lectureNo, lecture_name lectureName, id, room_num roomNum, start_date startDate, end_date endDate, lecture_time lectureTime, lecture_day lectureDay, lecture_price lecturePrice, update_date updateDate, create_date createDate FROM lecture;

SELECT lecture_name lectureName, id, room_num roomNum, start_date startDate, end_date endDate, lecture_time lectureTime, lecture_day lectureDay, lecture_price lecturePrice, FROM lecture WHERE lecture_no = #{lectureNo};
